publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4018 Rhona Brankin: National Galleries of Scotland Bill - Final Stage—That the Parliament agrees that the National Galleries of Scotland Bill be passed.
S1M-4018 Rhona Brankin: National Galleries of Scotland Bill - Final Stage—That the Parliament agrees that the National Galleries of Scotland Bill be passed.
S1M-4018 Rhona Brankin: National Galleries of Scotland Bill - Final Stage—That the Parliament agrees that the National Galleries of Scotland Bill be passed.
S1M-4018 National Galleries of Scotland Bill - Final Stage (lodged on 12 March 2003) Maureen Macmillan*
